participants.name: Jennifer (Carmen) Rojas
participants.title: People Ops Leader | Talent Acquisition Enthusiast | Culture Cultivator

messages.message:
Hi, Brian!

Hope all is well.

I have a cool digital marketing firm in Scottsdale who is looking for a Lead Web Developer to join their team and I thought of you. 

They have a progressive tech environment, competitive compensation package and solid benefits.

If you would be interested in discussing the opportunity, please follow the link below to schedule some time to chat that fits your availability:

https://calendly.com/nextjenrecruiting/30mingotomeeting

Hope to speak with you soon!
They probably don't have unlimited PTO? Is it weebly?

They do have unlimited PTO (and many other solid benefits as well as interesting projects, good growth and a great team). It is not Weebly.

Schedule a call, we'll chat, I'll give you all the deets...promise! :)

https://calendly.com/nextjenrecruiting/30mingotomeeting
Sorry. I don't talk to anyone that uses the word deets :P
Hmmm...and here I thought it was a charming affectation. Thanks for your time, though.
